set(LIBUTEE_S_SRC
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/arch/arm/utee_syscalls_a64.S
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/arch/arm/gprof/gprof_a64.S)

set(LIBUTEE_C_SRC
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api_property.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/abort.c
 #${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/trace_ext.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/assert.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/base64.c
 #${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api_arith.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api_objects.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api_operations.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api_se.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_api_panic.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_tcpudp_socket.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/tee_socket_pta.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/arch/arm/user_ta_entry.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}/arch/arm/utee_misc.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTILS_EXT_SRC}/snprintk.c
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTILS_EXT_SRC}/buf_compare_ct.c)

# Set up libutee.
add_library(oelibuteeasm OBJECT ${LIBUTEE_S_SRC})
set_property(TARGET oelibuteeasm PROPERTY C_STANDARD 99)
target_compile_options(oelibuteeasm PRIVATE
  ${OE_TZ_TA_S_FLAGS}
  -include ${OE_TZ_TA_DEV_KIT_CONF})
target_include_directories(oelibuteeasm PRIVATE
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_INC}
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTILS_EXT_INC})

add_library(oelibutee OBJECT ${LIBUTEE_C_SRC})
set_property(TARGET oelibutee PROPERTY C_STANDARD 99)
target_compile_options(oelibutee PUBLIC
  -include ${OE_TZ_TA_DEV_KIT_CONF})
target_include_directories(oelibutee PRIVATE
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_SRC}
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_INC}
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTILS_EXT_INC}
  ${OE_TZ_LIBUTILS_ISOC_INC}
  ${OE_TZ_LIBMPA_INC})
target_link_libraries(oelibutee PUBLIC
  oelibuteeasm
  oelibc)

install(DIRECTORY ${OE_TZ_LIBUTEE_INC}
  DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/openenclave/optee/libutee)

install(DIRECTORY ${OE_TZ_LIBUTILS_EXT_INC}
  DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/openenclave/optee/libutils/ext)
